name: portalis
description: Portalis - Your Gateway to the World

scripts.build: pnpm --filter "./packages/*" run build && pnpm --filter "./apps/*" run build
scripts.db:create: docker-compose exec api php bin/console doctrine:database:create --if-not-exists
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec api php bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate -n
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose exec api php bin/console app:seed:demo
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm run docker:up && timeout /t 10 && pnpm run db:create && pnpm run db:migrate && pnpm run db:seed && pnpm run api:docs
